name: The Black Sword
desc: A pitch-black longsword that thirsts for violence and conflict. It is said that this weapon can cause its user to become drunk on the red wine of slaughter.

values.desc: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by <color=#99FFFFFF>20%</color>. Additionally, regenerates <color=#99FFFFFF>60%</color> of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by <color=#99FFFFFF>25%</color>. Additionally, regenerates <color=#99FFFFFF>70%</color> of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by <color=#99FFFFFF>30%</color>. Additionally, regenerates <color=#99FFFFFF>80%</color> of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by <color=#99FFFFFF>35%</color>. Additionally, regenerates <color=#99FFFFFF>90%</color> of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by <color=#99FFFFFF>40%</color>. Additionally, regenerates <color=#99FFFFFF>100%</color> of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.
